%Self% has to call/DM someone and tell them you love them
Drink for every letter in your name

%Self% must drink!

Everyone chooses someone to drink

title: Besties
text: Everyone drinks except %Self% and a person of their choosing

title: Two lies, one truth
text: %Self% says two lies and one truth, everyone who picks a lie must drink

title: Two truths, one lie
text: %Self% says two truths and one lie, everyone who picks a truth must drink

title: Would you rather
text: play would you rather, the smaller group must drink, if tied both drink, %Self% asks the question

title: Truth or Truth
text: %Self% must ask someone of their choosing a question, they must answer truthfully
Drink if your drink is mixed
Drink if your drink has gin in it
%Self% and the person they've known the longest must drink
%Self% tells everyone their favourite weird pizza topping then drinks
Name a phobia you have then drink
%Self% must do what %Player1% tells them to, if you can't, take a drink
%Self% must guess the song that's playing, if there's no music or you guess wrong, drink
Nobody can speak at the same time as anyone else for %Turns%
The shortest person must sit on the ground for %Turns%
%Self% must close their eyes for %Turns%
The tallest person must stand up for %Turns%
%Self% ask %Player1% a general knowledge question, if they don't get it right they must drink
Everyone must do 10 pushups, if you can't then take a drink
